item.title: Résumé
item.dc:creator: [Rodrigo Dorantes-Gilardi]
item.description: Full Résumé Current position Postdoctoral fellow at Instituto Nacional de Medicina Genómica (March 2019) Past Data Scientist at Telcel (2018–2019) Education PhD in Applied Mathematics at Université Grenoble Alpes (2014–2018) Masters in Applied Mathematics at Universidad Autónoma de San Luis Potosí (2012–2014) Bachelor in Economics at Université de Toulouse (2008–2012)
item.content:encoded: Full Résumé Current position Postdoctoral fellow at Instituto Nacional de Medicina Genómica (March 2019) Past Data Scientist at Telcel (2018&ndash;2019) Education PhD in Applied Mathematics at Université Grenoble Alpes (2014&ndash;2018) Masters in Applied Mathematics at Universidad Autónoma de San Luis Potosí (2012&ndash;2014) Bachelor in Economics at Université de Toulouse (2008&ndash;2012)

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: [Rodrigo Dorantes-Gilardi]
item.description: My name is Rodrigo Dorantes-Gilardi and I’m a postdoc researcher at CSBIG Lab under the wing of Enrique Hernandez-Lemus and Jesús Espinal-Enríquez. My work is at the frontier between data science, networks, and bio-informatics.
item.content:encoded: My name is Rodrigo Dorantes-Gilardi and I&rsquo;m a postdoc researcher at CSBIG Lab under the wing of Enrique Hernandez-Lemus and Jesús Espinal-Enríquez. My work is at the frontier between data science, networks, and bio-informatics.
